des: "This is an old backwoods hand-me-down family recipe that will warm your insides and stick to your ribs.  Great for a cold winter's day or just when you want a quick filling meal. Serve with beef roast and garnish with diced fresh garden tomato."
ins: In a small bowl, stir together the flour and egg until crumbly. Bring the beef broth to a boil in a saucepan. Stir the flour mixture into the beef broth while boiling rapidly. Stir constantly until well blended.
